room_title: Escape room "The Lost Book of Spells" by Team Vs Time in Chicago
review: My friends and I had such a great time! The escape room is done so well that it immerses you in the game and you really have to work as a team and use all your senses to locate the clues. I highly recommend The lost Book of Spells for a fun night out!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Book of Spells" by Team Vs Time in Chicago
review: We had such a fun time tonight doing the Lost Book of Spells! It was a great way to celebrate a birthday!! Veronica was super friendly and helpful! We want to go back and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Book of Spells" by Team Vs Time in Chicago
review: This was my first escape room and I absolutely loved it! Our game master Veronica was the best and really knowledgeable. We did the Book of Spells room and it was so clever and exciting. I can't wait to come back and do the other rooms. Everyone was super friendly and fun to be around!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Book of Spells" by Team Vs Time in Chicago
review: Amazing experience! We played in a group of five and it was our first escape room experience. I must admit that we were a bit skeptical at the get go but as soon as we crossed through the door and into the witches lair our mood and experience was transformed into one of wonder and excitement. The ambiance and the environment were superb. You really felt like you were lost in a witch’s house in the woods. Each room felt very different and full of exciting surprises. We had so much fun working through the puzzles together. It’s a must do for everyone who likes this kind of experience. Two thumbs up.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Book of Spells" by Team Vs Time in Chicago
review: It was our first Escape Room experience and we decided to try Team vs. Time as it was recommended to us by a friend. We did not know what to expect but the experience blew us away. It was so unique, engaging, and entertaining. Team vs. Time did a spectacular job in creating a very unique and must do experience.
